website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Vigor 2.0 - Trait received a myriad of positive remarks from the purchasers. It became the footwear of choice for daily exercising, walking, and running errands for a considerable number of people. It was described as a comfortable, cushiony, and well-fitting trainer. However, its non-removable memory foam insole was criticized for deteriorating too quickly, causing underfoot discomfort. Some users also griped about the tight fit and the lack of outsole traction and durability. But overall, the shoe was found to be a reliable choice for its price.
pros: A vast majority of the users found the Skechers Vigor 2.0 - Trait to be a very comfortable shoe for walking, gym sessions, going out, and traveling
The cushioning of the trainer was highly praised by a significant number of wearers
The footwear was perceived as lightweight by many reviewers
It was able to meet the expectations of most purchasers in terms of size and width
the availability of the Wide Fit was greatly appreciated
A lot of buyers were happy with the quality-price ratio of the product
cons: A very common complaint coming from the users concerned the memory foam insert
apparently, it wore out and flattened faster than the rest of the shoe
A handful of reviewers deemed the fit to be too narrow even in the Wide Fit models
The outsole lacked traction on wet and smooth surfaces, according to some wearers
Several people reported that the rubber at the bottom peeled off too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Police Bike Unit Tested and Approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a Police Officer in the Bike Unit and these are the only sneakers he will buy for work. Every year we replace them with a new pair of the same sneakers. They hold up well to chasing criminals down. LOL He loves the way the memory foam feels. These sneakers are the most comfortable sneakers he has ever owned. Never any rubbing or blisters and they hold up well. He also wears these on his days off too. They are true to size and fit perfect each time. If this review was helpful to you in any way, please let me know by clicking on helpful. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: phillygrl

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I went to review these shoes. I did not realize it had been over a year since I purchased them. All in all, they are a good shoe. The soles on mine are pretty much worn out after a year but I am very hard on shoes. Also, I walk a lot after I get home from work and most days I walk at least a mile or more on sidewalks, paved and unpaved trails. For the price of these shoes, these are very good. I am buying another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: BTO

customer_reviews.title: Previously wore same shoe in size 11 which was fine for the first few weeks but as the shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Previously wore same shoe in size 11 which was fine for the first few weeks but as the shoe stretched the size became a bit loose and I had to keep tying it tighter. This time I went with 10.5; while they are snug out of the box I expect them to stretch and fit perfectly within a week or two of use. The memory foam is nice but enjoy it while it lasts, if you are on your feet all day it will lose its rebound within several months. This shoe does stand up to a fair amount of abuse. I'd recommend using for long days in retail environments, walking on hard concrete for 8 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Heem

customer_reviews.title: Balmy from the foam
customer_reviews.text: PROS: * Fit my feet perfectly (Sketchers tend to handle wide feet well) * Good arch supporrt CONS: * Memory foam is WARM Memory foam holds in more heat, and the upper is not ventilated enough to compensate. Outside, walking, they're okay, but a little warm. During a gym workout, they were downright balmy. Wicking, wool-blend socks help keep from getting slippy-sweaty, but once done, I was ready to take them off. I think I'd rather have a cheap insole and replace it with Sorbothane inserts. I've only had these a week, so it's too early to see how these will wear. I'm a heavy guy, so usually, my everyday shoes last no more than 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Josh (Xaminmo) Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Price BUT
customer_reviews.text: Great Price BUT.... Bought them a few times for my husband. He's a retail Manager so he's on concrete floors all day. At first the are great and super comfy but they only last about 4 months before the foam starts deforming and breaking off. Going to try a different shoe this time. The pictures are from two different pairs to show how the foam breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: David and Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Beware manufacturers defects..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair as a spare, as I have now owned many pair of skechers. I stored them until I needed them. These have a defect at the seams near the little toe on each sneaker. This seam has an abundance of glue/material on the inside of the seam. Rubs my toes and is very uncomfortable.First, I have never experienced this with other skechers. But I took it for granted with this pair and missed my return window. Be advised, check them as soon as you receive them...
customer_reviews.author: steve w.

customer_reviews.title: High quality shoes at a mid-range price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty hard on my tennis shoes, doing yard work, light farm work, walks/jogs with my dogs, etc... I like to purchase mid-range products for most things because I find they often last just as long as the higher-end products without the extra price, and don't fall a part like cheaply made products. This shoe really fits that description to a T. The stitches seem tight, the rubber is thick and adhered well, the insole is comfortable, and the sole has defined ridges without falling into the boot range. So far I've only had the shoes for a few weeks, but as long as I can get a year out of them I'll keep my rating at 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RaspenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Started out great
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear this shoe and have ordered it before. So lets say that I do a lot of walking. Thats why I got this shoe. But it didn't even last even four months., First the black rubber began separating in front of one shoe. Then a hard piece started coming out in the back into my heel. Made walking in them painful, Poorly made shoe. Probably the worst shoe I've ever had. I thought better of Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Sport Men's Vigor 2.0 Trait Memory Foam Sneaker GREAT SHOE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Skechers shoes for several years and found them to be high quality. Recently I needed to replace the Sport Men's Vigor 2.0 Trait and visited the local Skechers store and other retailers selling the brand. Could not find the model anywhere. I decided to try Amazon and found just what I wanted. Super job "AMAZON". I have used Amazon on several other items which were no longer carried in local stores and in most cases found just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: George C

customer_reviews.title: Company provided excellent service.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected. I now have two pair and will buy more. After my second full knee replacement and the resulting planter faciitis these are the only shoes I can wear on my three mile walks or all day working in the garden. The shoes didn't arrive when promised. I emailed the company. They sent another pair overnite and gave me a partial refund for my problems. So very satisfied. This is my go-to shoe company.
customer_reviews.author: Imua62

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a pare of counterfeit nike shoes and reebok shoes both from amazon and regret buying both. I am surprised these skechers shoes feel good, I walked around the house to see how they felt and was like walking on air. Five star at the moment so tomorrow will take my walk and give a better review. Update: Took my morning walk, first block was okay and from then on the shoes become uncomfortable. By the time I finished my one mile walk I was ready to sit down and take off the shoes. Sorry but I don't recommend these shoes for walking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C.

customer_reviews.title: Charlatan shoes buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I have barely worn these shoes and they already are having tread fall off these suck ass so much I have a desk job and am not in my feet all day but still in about a months time the shoes are broken in so much they don’t support my feet anymore will not be buying sketchers again
customer_reviews.author: David A Clayburn

customer_reviews.title: Was happy...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these and put them on, almost ordered a few more pairs on the spot just in case they were so comfortable. First few weeks, everything was great! About a month and half in started to feel something odd so checked the shoes for rocks or something...both had holes worn through foam...I was feeling the bottom of the shoe! How does both shoes wear out in less than two months? It was normal every day use, and I've "walked through" shoes before, but usually a year or so, not months. Oddly I'd probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Janes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesomely comfortable. updated review
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these shoes are amazing and can be compared to more expensive Merrels or Vibrams. I love these because you can buy 4 pairs for the price of one of its competitors. Update 1.5 months in, these shoes are still super comfortable, but the sole has started to come apart. I tried to find a contact email for the seller so I could try and get this resolved before I wrote this updated review. this is my first pair of Skechers that have started to come apart before they are a year old, so I'm hoping this is just a fluke, that's why I have subtracted one star from the review.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: BEST shoes for big & tall, flat-footed man
customer_reviews.text: My husband typically wears through sneakers (even the more hefty, hiking-type ones) in about 3 months. Like, he literally wears holes through the soles and toes. He is a large guy, with big feet (size 13-14W) and flat arches. I bought him a pair of these shoes one year ago and they are still intact! Not only can they take a beating (and last through it), they also have a nice memory foam sole which gives good support and cushion. I haven't found better for the price yet. They are really nice looking sneakers, too. I just bought him another pair because the ones he's been wearing for the past year are wearing down. Such a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jo87

customer_reviews.title: LIKED SO MUCH ORDERED A SECOND PAIR
customer_reviews.text: Husband says comfortable and lightweight. His many back problems are not made worse and his feet did not hurt at all even after wearing them all day with no break in period. He is off and on feet most days so he cannot testify as to comfort if a person stands all day. He hates shopping / trying on clothes or shoes and so keeps his clothing etc a long time. He liked these so much he ordered an exact second pair while they are still available to “save” until needed
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jade

customer_reviews.title: my husband is hooked on Sketchers!  Best pair ever
customer_reviews.text: I think this is his 3 pair of sketchers. The reviews said this had more support than normal. I thought that would be good for him because he wears them everyday as these are his only casual shoes. His choice, not necessity. He noticed the support right away and he loves them. And the price was incredible. They were only $37 for his size and we are both VERY happy with them. And the navy/gray or black color is very nice. He's very conservative and the navy was not too contrasting. Amazon you should \put on the description that these have more support. I only knew this from a review.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of Shoe Began to Disattach after 3 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: The glue came undone at the front side of the shoe a bit after less than a month of daily use. I read some recent reviews of others having similar problems with their glue these days, but I was foolish and ordered these anyway because I've always worn Sketchers. Waste of money, don't buy these. Sketchers really lost their quality and a lot of their other shoes are having similar "falling apart" issues by other recent reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Used to be a reliabe shoe
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a reliable shoe. This was a preferred shoe after switching from New Balance. Initially I was impressed with the quality of the double stitching and durability when used for work. However this most recent purchase was disappointing. The stitching came lose after 1 month which means no way to return. This is like my third or fourth pair and I never had an issue with the stitching coming apart even after 1 year! Not sure what changed but I may need to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly6

customer_reviews.title: Truly Amazing Comfort & Support
customer_reviews.text: Breathable, good materials, nice style, great sole, easy to get into. If you have problem feet like me (wide, sensitive to tightness, prone to need extra support and flexibility) these will be a great find. I even wear them around the house because the support gives me extra miles on my sore feet and knees. Outside in the dirt (we off-road a lot), they feel secure and have good footing (side to side and traction). Have not had long enough to evaluate durability, but finding a shoe that is supportive AND comfortable is a near miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are a good quality sneaker and they’re pretty comfortable, they even come with a spare set of laces which is nice. I will say that they’re just slightly on the small side. I bought these for wearing around the house and ordered them a 1/2 size larger so that they would be a little bit loose but they’re not. They do fit me but if I hadn’t ordered them a 1/2 size larger then they would have been too tight to wear. Still, I think that they’re a good quality shoe and the size problem is just a hazard of buying clothing and shoes online. I would recommend them and would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Out of the Box, this shoe is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe Neuropathy, and I have constant pain in my feet while wearing shoes. My feet only feel comfortable if I am barefoot, or wearing CROC Double Strap Sandals. I have paid fancy prices for fancy shoes that are supposed to be the best Neuropathy / Diabetic shoes around. Well guess what, Out of the Box, no added Comfort / Support insoles, and these Skechers Sneakers are the best my feet have felt wearing shoes in years. Literally years! BUT, I do have to say, this review is for the sneaker right out of the box, I do not know about durability, or longevity of the life of this sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have finicky feet. I work in retail, do 30,000 plus steps a shift, and finding shoes that don't tear my feet to shreds has been tough. The only pair I'd found that worked for me was discontinued, so I set out to find a new shoe. This is it. If you have wide feet or close set toes and your standard shoe causes chronic corns and blisters, I'd recommend looking at this shoe. Not only have those problems totally abated, they're super comfortable to boot. They're reasonably stylish, but for me that was a secondary concern. I just wanted comfortable shoes and these are just that, for a price tat was, in my case, more than fair.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Williams

customer_reviews.title: Masculine, comfortable, light weight, and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I'm a New Balance guy, however, this year Sketchers is making the superior shoe. These shoes do not have the quality control issues that the other brands suffer. Some have stated that memory foam insoles do not work for heavier people. I'm 6' 173lbs and I find the insoles very comfortable (your mileage may vary). Masculine, comfortable, light weight, and true to size. Perfect casual shoe to hit the streets. I bought directly (sold and shipped by) Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N'Tucky Mnkey

customer_reviews.title: good all round shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shoes for a hike on the "Bright Angel" trail at the grand canyon. We went 1.5 miles down and 1.5 miles up. I'm not a hiker. These shoes performed well, held up fine. Good grip. Comfortable. No rubbing or discomfort whatsoever - from the shoes. They are fine for walking, running and obviously off-road trail hiking. A hard core hiker might not like them, but I'm not a hard core hiker. The memory foam is still intact and is nice. Will buy again when they wear out, but they haven't yet.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but only for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This sneakers is ok, it’s comfortable at first, but doesn’t have much support if you try using for a walk or a short hike. If you use for simple stuff like work and gym it should last about 3-5 months it only lasts my husband 3 months of light use until it starts to fall apart. Not suitable for hikes as it doesn’t support your heels and you can twist your feet very easily. If the price was higher I would give less stars, but since it’s pretty affordable, I think 3 stars is a fair rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ashe

customer_reviews.title: This is the second pair in a row where the sole split
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these shoes in November of 2018 and by early January parts of the sole split from the rest of the shoe. Amazon sent me a replacement and less than two months into those the sole began to split again. This time however the return window seems much shorter because it ended a month after I got the replacement pair. I don't wear these shoes to do any major activities that would cause them to fail, but they have now twice. I will call Amazon customer support and see if there is anything that they can do for me. If not, I will be extremely upset.
customer_reviews.author: tazdev

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, good quality, excellent comfort, and long lasting.  Great price too!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's second pair of sketcher memory foam shoes. The first pair weren't really worn out after three years, but he got paint on them (painting a room for me) so he asked for another pair because he wears them all the time ( cutting grass, working out, walking, painting,...). The first pair would still look brand new if not for the paint. He likes these because he is a big big guy and the extra wide size is perfect for him. They are very comfortable and the memory foam lasted about two years in the first pair and he replaced it - good as new.
customer_reviews.author: clf

customer_reviews.title: They"re well ventalated, and not water resistant at all
customer_reviews.text: This was my first clothing purchase ever online, I like to really experience what I'm buying before committing to a sale, this didn't build my confidence to buy more, because it seems it's okay to sell what nobody wants to buy in the store online. They're okay, the cushioning seems to be already giving away, the landing experience is a bit of a shock to my feet right now when walking, I notice I can really feel surface objects through the shoes landing such as pointy rocks and such. They don't seem like the quality I bought back in 2006, I'm starting to shop for replacement shoes from another brand meanwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Hornung

customer_reviews.title: Heel seems to be collapsing on the right/outside
customer_reviews.text: So, to be fair, I've done a LOT of walking in these. On the other hand, I don't feel they've held up as they should and have not held up as well as other shoes I've owned. PROS Nice enough looking shoe that they are can almost be worn as casual wear. Don't have the look of 'trainers' Have been VERY durable CONS The right/outside part of the heel has collapsed about 1/4", giving me a decided tilt when walking. I'm going to have to get rid of these.
customer_reviews.author: jT

customer_reviews.title: As always, Sketchers are definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He picked out the color, which I wasn't thrilled with. But when they arrived... They really ARE great looking shoes! And the tread on the soles is awesome. We've had a lot of ice lately, and he had double the traction in these as he did with his big winter boots! They fit perfectly. I chose Sketchers for him because of what a fantastic shoe they make. I have a pair of Sketchers sandals from 1994, and they look almost new, including the soles! Fantastic product that LASTS. You really can't go wrong with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Saiyuki53

customer_reviews.title: Good cushioning with normal sole form
customer_reviews.text: Whew!! This shoe made walking possible again. I was walking 7-plus miles/day until my hips were so sore in my old shoes that I had to quit and take Ibuprofen. These shoes did the trick for me. I had some other Sketchers that I never used because there had a rocking-chair type of sole. I was pleased to find the sole on these new shoes to be standard form. I bought 1/2 size larger than normal due to reviews and found these to be instant relief. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good support and warm shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe it fits good and very cushiony since I have no arch and a flat foot these shoes help my feet and back for the memory foam part they are a thick shoe will keep your feet warm so I suggest thin socks if you get to hot to fast i did fall this morning with these shoes I thought they were suppose to be slip resistant but I guess not other then that it a good shoe so far only been wearing them a few days these shoes will be great for anyone who's feet stays cold they hold in all the feet heat ...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates shopping, especially for anything shoe or clothing related, so it proves difficult sometimes to find him the right goods, and still have him looking good/feeling good. He likes black, and has wide feet, so these were perfect, and he still feels like he can look decent when we go out. These were fine for their purpose, and a great deal on price. For those who have stubborn, hates to shop partners? These are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kaer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the sand
customer_reviews.text: My daily routine involves seven miles on the shore, and this can be harsh on the treads of most shoes. This one has held up relatively well over the past year with minimal wear. The memory foam insoles are a bonus, although I don't think I can remove or replace them if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap adhesive used for sole.
customer_reviews.text: Sole began to tear away in about 6 months. I just used them for the office so no heavy walking in them. Just cheaply made. Wouldn’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Ramos Jr.

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY MADE SHOES!!! PRICED FAR BELOW WORTH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Size perfect fit and great Skechers quality. My feet were the problem. I have high arches and the memory foam does not support my feet, I need bounce on sole not the inside. Anyone with regular arch feet would have loved these shoes. I walk 3 miles a day and if a shoe does not give me proper balance, I feel have leg muscle problems. Great bang for buck. SKECHERS makes great quality shoes. BLAME MY FEET!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill W. Hogge

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: So bummed though my husband doesn't wear tennies but mostly boots and after only a few wears these started to fall apart!!!! Horrible craftmanship!!! The glue holding the bottom on started to separate after just 3-4 wears of the shoe??? Maybe I got from a bad batch but I doubt it... These are cheaply made and even cheaper when putting together... All in all they lasted my hubby less than 10 wears and we're falling to pieces!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This might be the last pair of Skechers that I purchase. I bought these 5 months ago and I wear them only a couple of days a week because I wear boots at work during the day. The memory foam insole is losing chunks already which happened to my last pair after 2 years of use. I can expect sneakers to wear our after a year or more of use but not 5 months. They still look like they just came out of the box on the outside but the missing foam makes them very uncomfortable to wear. I tried to contact the manufacturer but there is no option.....
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: CONSISTANTLY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Sketchers for the last 10 years. They fit right every time, they wear well and they are comfortable to wear. The memory foam soles are like walking on air. I try to have three or four pairs going at all times. As a bonus, Amazon carries many styles at wonderful prices. Shop the sales, there is always at least one color combination at a terrific price. Can't go wrong with Sketchrs
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like these, and have bought quite a few pair over the past couple of years. My only complaint is that the insoles don't last as long as the outer sneaker. The memory foam is great, but only for about five or six months, then they just get too flat. I think they should make them removable, and offer replacement insoles for sale.
customer_reviews.author: smltwngrl5

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable day after day
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these a few months ago. They are durable and oh, so comfortable. The memory foam insert almost feels like you are walking on a pillow. I use these primarily for my daily walks, so I'm logging 10-15 miles a week. Plus I wear them around the house when doing chores. They feel great every time I put them on, and I don't get that heavy, worn-down feeling after a while that you get with some sneakers. This is the best sneaker purchase I've ever made, and I'll definitely be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent design for support and cushioning the foot fall!
customer_reviews.text: Another pair of terrific Skechers. Second pair of this model. I ordered 13s again. A bit tight before. What’s changed? Oops. I ordered too small. Hard to believe I need a 14! Perhaps their sizing demands sizing up. ?? Not the case for me with other models. Skechers are my best brand ever. Some say they don’t last as long. Might be a product of this superior design. They “wear” so well, day to day, more frequent replacement (30%??) is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl F Roush

customer_reviews.title: Very UNHAPPY-  Need to talk to a person.
customer_reviews.text: At first these where perfect but after only 1+ month since it was a present. The inside of shoe kept bunching up and the inside of shoe become loose and separated. Basically they started falling apart. So how do I : Get Money Back Get Shoes Replaced Order something else I can mail the shoes back or send pictures which ever you would like. I no longer have the box as my dad who they where for through out box. Hope to hear from you shortly. Jay'Lynn
customer_reviews.author: Jay'Lynn Cullisn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These things are comfortable! These memory foam shoes are the only shoes I'll be buying from now on. I used to just buy any kind of shoe and put in Dr. Scholls. This is way more comfortable. My mom bought be a pair about 2 or so years ago, a different style, but still memory foam. Those were awesome too. It's like walking on pillows. If you do a lot of standing or walking, these are perfect. Not sure about running. I'm not a running. Just a big guy with feet. If I weren't broke, i'd buy another pair just to switch things up, but I've always been a one pair of shoes at time kind of guy.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hat

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Functional, Comfortable, Long-Lasting
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of heavy use, my Skechers are going strong with good traction. The cushioned insole makes them comfortable all day, walking, standing at computer, yard work... They're not my regular gym shoe, but they work very well in the gym, and for running when I'm in a hurry. The Vigor 2.0 has enough rubber and leather to keep my feet dry in rain, with reasonably good ventilation higher up. These Skechers are somewhat wide in fitting. In most sneakers, I take width E with moderate to slightly loosened lacing for a good fit. In the Skechers E width, I tighten the laces a lot to get the same good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes had great reviews and no major complaints. They fit perfect as comfortable to walk in . I would recommend these shoes and would buy again. They fit as ordered and glad I bought them when I did since I saved $15 off the price that makes this transaction priceless . They are constructed very well been wearing them for two weeks and my feet feel great in them .
customer_reviews.author: Snake Pisken

customer_reviews.title: Fits as described and a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about buying a pair of shoes online without trying them on. I needed a pair of descent, comfortable and affordable shoes to wear around outside in the yard. These shoes fit just right and were as exactly as described. I’d recommend these shoes and have with them having the same experience. Having free returns if they did not fit helped me make my initial decision.
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wore maybe 12 times and my feet are killing me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes offer no support. The first couple times you wear them they seem really comfortable. They're so squishy. That's the problem. I walk 15,000 steps on concrete floors for my job. I switch between three pairs of shoes so I wore these every third shift. Last shift I was in so much pain I barely made it through. These were an experiment for me. I'll stick to Asics and New Balance I guess.
customer_reviews.author: MplsMary

customer_reviews.title: unreal comfort
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are the most comfortable sneakers ever. Wore them for first time yesterday walking around Manhattan all day and felt like i was walking on a cushion of air. Form Fit Function A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Costantino

customer_reviews.title: Took a little getting used to the memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet for 10 hours a day so comfortable shoes are a necessity. I also destroy shoes due to my job so cost is a factor. These are extremely comfortable. It took me a day to get used to them, the memory foam is different for sure. At first it felt like I was walking in sand or something but I got used to that. The foam is very soft and at the end of the day, I appreciate that
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and price
customer_reviews.text: The last six pairs of tennis shoes I have bought have been this style and model so I know the shoe well but this is the first time I have bought a pair online. I did this because the local dealer's price keeps going up. This pair was $15 less than theirs with free shipping so I thought I'd try it. The shoes are perfect. I will get my next pair from them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Daring

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam insole ???? NOT
customer_reviews.text: First couple of times wearing like a cloud...even rotating with others shoes... now fells like walking on little deflated pillows...and where the insole meets the inside edge your side edge of ur foot starts to get rubbed between the insole and shoe...started to get a blister then it turned into a callus...not good
customer_reviews.author: d007

customer_reviews.title: Kinda narrow,order a W if you have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9 x wide but was mistakenly sent a reg 9. I was going to return but I losend up the laces and they actually fit better than I expected and I have wide short feet. A 9 W would fit better so if you normally wear a W size I recommend ordering it. Like I said it surprisingly fits better than I thought but it is a tad tight but bearable.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes, most comfortable shoes ever. Feels like walking on a cloud =)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. They are the most comfortable shoes ever. They might not look great, but they feel amazing on my feet. These are the 2nd pair I have bought, and I use these shoes as my "everyday shoes" or when I know I am going to be walking around a lot. The memory foam isn't the best quality and will eventually wear down, but for $40 you aren't going to get Grade-A memory foam anyways. Overall, I recommend this shoe to anyone who has foot problems, walks a lot, or if you have wide feet (the normal size is wide enough to fit my feet, and I normally purchase wide-size shoes)
customer_reviews.author: qualiFIED

customer_reviews.title: Great traction on asphalt and smooth floors
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits well, and is good value for money. I have been using it four months now, and is comfortable to wear all day at work, exercise and run errands. I bought it for jogging , but now wear it all day. Great product. I definitely will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerwyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Construction
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this shoe 3 times in the past. This pair was apparently not constructed to the same quality standards as in the past. The plastic insert in the last lacing hole broke within a month. Now another eyelet has pulled out. Unfortunately this happened after the last date for return of the shoe to Amazon. I will not be purchasing this shoe again. I hope this doesn't mean all of Skecher products are lower in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Orpheus II

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8. I ordered a size 8 then a 9 and even a third size 10. They were all too small. I returned both pairs and went to Skechers store and bought a size 8. These must be knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide with good support, very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes, they fit well and look good.. This is my 3rd pair of skechers, for me the width of these shoes makes all the difference. My feet are wide and get sore when i wear tight shoes. Another good thing about these is the arch support, i really like these shoes.. No, i wasnt paid or given any merchandise to say that, just my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: Not made for walking w/USPS.
customer_reviews.text: I had these shoes for one month and the inside sole started to rip. Front of sneaker started to open after maybe 3weeks walking. I walk a lot and thought these sneakers would keep my feet comfortable and safe. These sneakers did none of the above. Not happy with Skechers products as a whole after this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for the support of Sketchers from 10 years ago, keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: These are nothing like my last pair of Sketchers. The memory foam causes your foot to sink into the shoe in a way that makes you feel like you're trying to walk on a soft mattress. and I don't mean that in a good way. If you're wanting the sole from Sketchers of 10 years ago, try Fila Disruptors. They run small, but have that supportive sole that Sketchers used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny (I Got Your Number)

customer_reviews.title: ordered the extra wide sketcher shoe for men, got a wide shoe.
customer_reviews.text: the shoe was a nice sketcher shoe for men, was glad to order as he wanted a x wide shoe, shipping was extra fast, got in 2 days, was so disappointed with the shoe being a wide. He did not return the shoe, as he has wore wide before, just a bit snug, I would be afraid to order again as the same thing may happen, am sad for that as he found a shoe he loved and the size he liked and with the pleasure of Amazon ordering I never had to return any product to Amazon before .
customer_reviews.author: lois hardin

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, and durable! Skechers are my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Skechers are my all-time favorite sneakers and casual shoes for comfort, fit, and durability. I've owned pairs of Skechers sneakers that have lasted me for 5 years and longer, and no other sneaker on the market has ever lasted me that long and maintained the same durability, good looks, and comfort as Skechers shoes have. I will gladly buy more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BMac67

customer_reviews.title: Looks like one of them was worn
customer_reviews.text: The package was a bag that was all dirty and looked like someone opened it a little to see what was inside, the box was okay a little messed up but no damage on the shoes, when i opened the box one of the shoes looked like someone tried it on laces were untied and there was no paper or cardboard inside unlike the other shoe that laces were tied like at the store and there was paper and cardboard inside but shoes looked new, clean and size is good.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I have amazingly huge flat feet, so I was happy with the fit even though it will take a little while for me to break these in. Unfortunately, the memory insole can NOT be removed. It would have been nice to have that little bit of extra space while I got them broken in! I positively hate wearing shoes and socks, but with winter coming up I needed a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Whyn's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great until memory foam wears out
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for the first few months. But once the memory foam is smashed in heel and ball of foot, the comfort is diminished. You can’t remove and replace with different insoles, so you have to replace the shoes before they’re worn out. I have a friend at work that buys new Schechers steel toes every 4-6 months. Now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: John Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I hit the gym everyday, and workout on the treadmill (4 mile @ 15 degree hour) I have had issues with several top brands breaking down at the heel, and just uncomfortable. This is my second pair, and I have clocked hundreds of comfortable miles on my older pair, and if you want comfort, for pleasure/casual or working out, then you have to try these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lawman 004

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Sketchers for a few years now, and they are my every day wear. I like them a lot. My only complaint is the fact that, although advertised as black, they are not. They are more of a charcoal color. I am going to keep them for work shoes. Now, if Sketchers will only make this type of shoe in true black, that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Travis

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of shoe peeling off after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to use for work as I do manual labor outside. I don’t know if it’s because they got wet over and over or just overworked the shoes, but after 1 month of using these shoes 5 days a week, the bottom of the shoe began to peel off. I’ve had to use shoe goo to glue it back for now but I won’t be repurchasing. A great looking and comfortable work shoe but it just isn’t made to withstand what I need it too
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Great walking/work shoe, low low price!
customer_reviews.text: After trying many shoes and boots for work, it was these $40 skechers that stood out! I'm on my feet for 8 hours a day at work and do alot of walking on concrete floors which hurt my feet, these shoes did make it much easier and more comfortable. I have had them for over a year now and they are my favorite work shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: I,ve been waring Skechers for many years, and am still satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I tried switching to New Balance, since they used to have a good wide shoe. Not any more. They, (4E) are way too narrow in the toe area, and now will be going to Good will. The Skechers are nice and wide, and so far feeling good, even walking down steep embankments. That's where the New Balance were killing my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Recent price hike beware!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, have bought multiple pairs over past two years but now suddenly price went from $35 a pair to $65. 100% increase in cost after steady price for 2 years is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brown

customer_reviews.title: A nice, comfortable athletic shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Skechers memory foam sneakers for several years in different styles and have never been disappointed. They are comfortable and durable. I generally stay with what works for me since comfort is my main goal for my aging, arthritic joints. I actually own two pairs at a time - different colors. So far, this has been the best brand for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Soaring-Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Great for Older Generations to Walk More
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my father who has really wide feet (I purchased the wide fit size 12) and these shoes fit him perfectly. His knees bother him so he walks slowly and says the padding in the shoes help him walk more. With the ankle support and the wide fit, these sketchers are a perfect match for him.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Caught on sale and worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I've had this type of shoe before and the memory foam is like walking on clouds. The only downside is with everyday use the memory foam will be less effective, generally 9months in my case. The last pair lasted quite some time and I'll keep around, maybe try to replace the memory foam in it or at the very least, use as outdoor work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: A Good everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected. They are quite comfortable. I wear them most of the time; they are my "everyday" shoes. They don't get hot. The support is adequate, even with my plantar fasciaitis and occasional gout. I've worn them in rain; my feet stayed dry and the shoes dried quickly. I've had them about a week, so I can't comment on their longevity. I would recommend them and would buy them again. A good shoe at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: drbill

customer_reviews.title: Left side defective.
customer_reviews.text: Left side I believe is defective. Right side is fine. Left side for some reason pushes my foot over the edge which causes it to hurt! I already wore them to work so I can not return them. Toe box is a little tight due to the thickness of the memory foam. Order half size up to fix that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Israel F.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes...for the first 5 weeks or so and then the memory foam starts to "fade away" leaving you with not-so-soft insoles that truly need store-bought inserts to feel remotely comfortable thereafter. The outside of the shoe lasts at least 6 months of daily wear before starting to fall apart....the outer soles of the shoes will start to unglue and you'll be walking around with flaps. This is the third pair of these I've purchased...great for work and easily replaced at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: iburiedhoop

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These are well made shoes and very comfortable. Seem a little tight when you first put them on each time, but when your feet sink into the memory-foam they are just right. I like the way the tongues can be interwoven into the shoe-strings to keep them in place each time you step into the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Camera Buff

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers are the bomb
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. I do alot of walking at work and climb in and out of buses.I have destroyed countless wally world shoes within 6 months before. I am still using the first pair of Sketchers which I bought over a year ago. I bought this second set to wear to special events and meetings. Highly recommended! LONG LASTING
customer_reviews.author: DarrelR

customer_reviews.title: Had higher expectations.
customer_reviews.text: The last pair of Sketchers shoes I purchased, I wore daily at work. I put a lot of miles on shoes when I'm working (30+ miles a week easily) and these lasted about a month before a huge tear developed in the side of one of the shoes. On top of that, the soles came apart and the memory foam insole began to wrinkle. I didn't have these problems with the other Sketchers shoes I had prior to these. I wouldn't recommend these shoes if you walk a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: pairs are not the same size! one of them is not stable on the flat ground.
customer_reviews.text: The right pair is longer than the left. Also it is not stable. When you put on a flat ground the right pair does not sit stable. Its heel stays up from the left. When you push down and up it moves. I thought after the Model-T was introduced a standardization took place in the industrial production. It seems that at least not at the factory of this Skechers that I got. I
customer_reviews.author: Said

customer_reviews.title: Check the left instep of these pieces of garbage sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst sneakers. The sides split in less than 2 weeks. I asked for an exchange for the defective sneakers, and got another pair of defective sneakers out of the freakin box. Amazon apparently has no clue about issues of quality control. These sneakers are a piece crap.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law was having troubles with each pair of shoes we bought him even in the wide width complaining that his feet hurt so bad. He put these on and loosened the forefoot and has been pain free since. Says this is the best pair of shoes in his 65 years. He’s happy we found a pair of extra wide shoes for him. He loves the memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Wikim27

customer_reviews.title: Another complaint about the narrow toe area
customer_reviews.text: Squishes my pinky toe with my normal 9 Wide. This is the second pair of Skechers that have caused the same rubbing of my pinky toe and the one next to it. Guess I will have to go back to New Balance even though their quality is not what it used to be but at least my toes didn't get rubbed raw.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the memory foam inserts. Only worn them for 2 days but they feel broken in. Comfortable to walk in. They are true to the size for my feet. I live in Florida and don’t wear socks. The upper seems to breath well and my feet don’t feel sweaty. Arch support is very good and comfortable. I have wide feet but so far the shoe is wide enough. I’ll update this review as the sneaker wears in.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boulden

customer_reviews.title: skechers are the best
customer_reviews.text: during these uncertain time im finding it hard to find a store that is a open and that have my skechers sport with memory foam and wide fit . and thanks to the great people at amazon I have found them thank you amazon .. I spend a lot of time on my feet so skechers sport feels great... thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Daniel woerner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sneakers for big wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the fit. He wears size 16 extra wide. Tall man who appreciates a well made shoe/sneaker. He only wears sketchers. This pair has the memory foam insole and he tells me they are very comfortable. The price was excellent as well. When we see sketchers in his size we buy them and the price offered here amazing. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: We'll see what it's like to spend the day in them
customer_reviews.text: You might say I have a "broad understanding" - depending on the manufacturer I wear shoes anywhere from size 14 4E (New Balance) to 15 2E (these Sketchers). I just got this pair of Vigor 2.0 Trail Memory Foam sneakers (my first pair of Sketchers), and I'm impressed by the fit and finish. We'll see what it's like to spend the day in them, and how they hold up in the long run (no pun intended). And the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargin
customer_reviews.text: I like to take brisk 4-6 mile walks and these shoes are perfect for me. The extra wide fit keeps them from being too tight on a walk and the memory foam adds extra comfort. My one criticism is the package they were shipped in. The Shipper sent them in a plastic bag which caused the shoe box to get crushed in transit. Over all a good shoe at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P55

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These !
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy and avid walker most of my life. These are comfy, reasonably-priced and long lasting. Also love the availability in weird sizes (like my 13 extra wide). For about 50 bucks they are a deal. On my 3rd pair over 6 years; after they lose some of the 'bouncy' - I turn 'em into work shoes and toss them after about 2.5 years of hard use (used 'em on a post hurricane cleanup project). Nice and will keep buying them
customer_reviews.author: MalX

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for big guys with wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of this style Skeecher shoes we have purchased for my husband over the years. He has a really hard time finding shoes wide enough with enough support. These shoes are his favorite. As soon as the current pair starts breaking down, I get him a new pair ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Chrane

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaaaaaaay to small. I have owned 3 pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit too small. Before I purchased this model, I have owned 3 pair of sketchers. I never had a problem with the previous shoe size, but this model had a different fit. After trying them on for size, I found they barely fit. After trying on the exchanged pair for size, I was actually content with the fit. I suggest buying a pair the next half size up. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Vince J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the Sketchers shoes they are comfortable and help with my back pain. Although i don't know where they get there materials the last 2 pairs i have bought were great. until they got dirty and we washed them after that they smell rotten and make my feet smell horrendous. if this pair is the same way i will switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father so I dont know specifics of the fit but he did say they fit as expected. He loved the memory foam insert and said they were very comfortable. He lives in the city and does a lot of walking. So far he is impressed with the comfort of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SF513

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and fit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sneakers for my husband who has wide feet. He has 3 other pairs of sneakers and when he wears them he always complains that they are either too tight or his feet hurt after wearing them for a few hours! He absolutely loved these sneakers! He has no complaints and constantly raves about how comfortable they are and how great they feel! Great sneakers!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Bud
customer_reviews.text: I love Skecher Sneakers and shoes, that's all I own. But this pair must have been the end of the run. The soles had to be re-glued in places, the laces came tangled. Although they are brand new, I'm not sending them back. Superglue works wonders, just disappointed in quality of this pair.
customer_reviews.author: VinceB

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for everyday use and great price ....run true to size
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son. He just needed a new, decent looking sneaker to wear with jeans or shorts. I don't know how they would work for any kind of workout but they are great for everyday use. He always wears size 12. He tried them on after work when his feet would possibly be swollen and had thick work socks on. They fit nicely and fit even better with his regular socks. My point? These sneaks definitely do not run small. They seem very true to size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 16 W and have a hard time finding a good fit, but the Sketcher fit perfectly. The memory foam lining makes them very comfortable. They are very well made and for the price a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Hartik

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: I've had these sneakers for over a year. They are comfortable for standing around. I found walking in them for extended distances makes my feet hurt. The foam collapses causing the shoe to lose foot support. Tightening the laces doesn't seem to help. Update: Existing problems with hip displeasure was made more severe as a result of wearing these sneakers. These shoes have no true foot support. If you have issues requiring shoes with true support these are not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: My2cents

product_meta.title: Skechers Vigor 2.0 Trait, Men's Vigor 2.0 Trait
product_meta.description: Sporty features, like cooling microperforations and a stability midfoot, keep feet comfortable and supported for leisure activities.
feature_bullets: Sporty features, like cooling microperforations and a stability midfoot, keep feet comfortable and supported for leisure activities.
Closure Type: Lace-up; Strap Type: Adjustable-strap
